abstract: Editorial, calling for continued reader support of The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, describes how Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens helped Trinidadian immigrant Michelle Sand of Queens pay her utility bills as she struggled to obtain her green card, finish her schooling and find steady employment.
lead_paragraph: The Neediest Cases Fund helps a single mother from Trinidad pay the bills.

headline.main: Keeping the Lights On During a Dark Time
headline.print_headline: Trying to Keep the Lights On

snippet: The Neediest Cases Fund helps a single mother from Trinidad pay the bills.
